subject: [R] extractor rows from a matrix
body:
hi!
i have a little problem: my data's matrix has 1093 rows and 3 columns.
i'd like to extract each rows..

something like this:
ht= my matrix
Dt=(???)=a vector with t=1,2...1093

what can i do?
thank you!

Vincenzo
